headline.main: Struggling Rams Fire Head Coach Fisher
headline.print_headline: Struggling Rams Fire Head Coach Fisher

docs.snippet: The struggling Los Angeles Rams have fired head coach Jeff Fisher after losing eight of their last nine games in what has become a disappointing homecoming season, the National Football League team said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The struggling Los Angeles Rams have fired head coach Jeff Fisher after losing eight of their last nine games in what has become a disappointing homecoming season, the National Football League team said on Monday.

headline.main: New York City’s Child Welfare Commissioner, Gladys Carrión, Resigns
headline.print_headline: More Setbacks for City Services as Head of Child Welfare Resigns

docs.snippet: Ms. Carrión’s departure comes after a succession of child deaths and at a time when the agency is enduring criticism and the exits of other leaders....
docs.abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio announces that Gladys Carrion is stepping down as commissioner of city’s Administration for Children’s Services after succession of deaths that raised concerns about agency's supervision of children; Carrion's departure is latest in series of shakeups in mayor's health and social services team.
docs.lead_paragraph: Ms. Carrión’s departure comes after a succession of child deaths and at a time when the agency is enduring criticism and the exits of other leaders.

headline.main: Trump Joins Line of Critics of Costly Fighter Jet
headline.print_headline: Trump Is the Latest Critic of F-35 Jet Whose Costs Spiraled ‘Out of Control’

docs.snippet: His criticism of the F-35 Joint Strike Fighter, posted on Twitter, continued a pattern in which the president-elect has targeted businesses for criticism and threatened presidential action....

byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear reported from Washington, Christopher Drew from New York and Isabel Kershner from Jerusalem.
byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR, CHRISTOPHER DREW and ISABEL KERSHNER

docs.lead_paragraph: His criticism of the F-35 Joint Strike Fighter, posted on Twitter, continued a pattern in which the president-elect has targeted businesses for criticism and threatened presidential action.

headline.main: New Approach to Corporate Tax Law Has House G.O.P. Support

docs.snippet: A business tax overhaul championed by a Berkeley professor could advance President-elect Donald J. Trump’s job-creation agenda without tariffs or presidential deal-making....
docs.abstract: House Republicans are promoting job creation plan that will overhaul corporate tax system by eliminating deduction for capital investment interest costs and taxing products based on where they are consumed rather than where they were made; concept is already drawing skepticism from retailers and may face opposition from real estate developers, Wall Street financiers and industries with heavy reliance on imports.
docs.lead_paragraph: A business tax overhaul championed by a Berkeley professor could advance President-elect Donald J. Trump’s job-creation agenda without tariffs or presidential deal-making.

headline.main: European Commission Hints at Leeway on Aid for Italy's Banks
headline.print_headline: European Commission Hints at Leeway on Aid for Italy's Banks

docs.snippet: The European Commission is ready to discuss with Italy several options to address problems in its banking sector, the vice president of the EU executive said on Monday, signalling state support would be viewed benignly under EU fiscal rules....
docs.lead_paragraph: The European Commission is ready to discuss with Italy several options to address problems in its banking sector, the vice president of the EU executive said on Monday, signalling state support would be viewed benignly under EU fiscal rules.

headline.main: Russia Wanted Delay in Aleppo Ceasefire, but Unacceptable to U.S.-State Department
headline.print_headline: Russia Wanted Delay in Aleppo Ceasefire, but Unacceptable to U.S.-State Department

docs.snippet: The U.S. State Department said on Monday that Russia told the United States it wanted a ceasefire in east Aleppo, Syria, delayed for several days, a proposal the agency said was unacceptable in view of the continued attacks on civilians....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. State Department said on Monday that Russia told the United States it wanted a ceasefire in east Aleppo, Syria, delayed for several days, a proposal the agency said was unacceptable in view of the continued attacks on civilians.

headline.main: House Intelligence Chairman: No Benefit in Opening New Russia Hack Probe
headline.print_headline: House Intelligence Chairman: No Benefit in Opening New Russia Hack Probe

docs.snippet: The chairman of the U.S. House of Representatives Intelligence Committee said on Monday his committee has been conducting "vigorous oversight" of the investigations into election-related cyber attacks and he did not see any benefit in opening more...
docs.lead_paragraph: The chairman of the U.S. House of Representatives Intelligence Committee said on Monday his committee has been conducting "vigorous oversight" of the investigations into election-related cyber attacks and he did not see any benefit in opening more probes.

headline.main: Fire Hits Apartment Block on Dubai's Artificial Palm Island
headline.print_headline: Fire Hits Apartment Block on Dubai's Artificial Palm Island

docs.snippet: Fire broke out at an upmarket apartment block on the artificial Palm island in Dubai in the United Arab Emirates on Monday but there were no immediate reports of any casualties, the emirate's media office said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fire broke out at an upmarket apartment block on the artificial Palm island in Dubai in the United Arab Emirates on Monday but there were no immediate reports of any casualties, the emirate's media office said.
